meetMarkData.title: Hello
meetMarkData.text: To offer you individual psychotherapy, couples counselling, acute couples therapy, marriage counselling and family therapy, I have undertaken practice, reflection, own therapy, ongoing training and professional supervision in England and Denmark since 2004. I hold an MA in Psychosynthesis Psychotherapy with Merit from the University of East London, in 2011.

meetMarkData.title: Professional orientation
meetMarkData.text: My psychotherapeutic practice revolves around psychosynthesis, and is further inspired by process oriented psychology, as well as Jungian, humanistic and transpersonal elements.

meetMarkData.title: Qualifying educational background
meetMarkData.text: I am an accredited member of two professional organisations: UKCP (UK Council for Psychotherapy) and EFPP (European Federation for Psychosynthesis Psychotherapy). I am also a member of the Danish C.G. Jung Union.

meetMarkData.title: Further education and supervision
meetMarkData.text: To keep my professional training ajour I annually attend international courses, lectures and workshops. I receive individual supervision via UKCP. Supervision helps me hold ethical considerations, illuminates the unconscious relations in the therapy room and also provides a space to consider specific challenges.

meetMarkData.title: Teaching and lecturing
meetMarkData.text: I have international teaching and lecturing experience within psychotherapy, and have held workshops at annual psychotherapy conferences.
